name: Trello Capabilities
description: Evaluation dataset for Trello subagent capabilities including board management, card operations, lists, and checklists. Includes lazy queries, intentional mistakes, and ambiguous items.

items.expected_output: Create new Trello board with name 'Project Alpha'.
Get member's boards.

items.input: add list 'To Do' to project board
items.expected_output: 1. Find project board. 2. Add new list named 'To Do'.

items.input: create card 'Review PR' in To Do list
items.expected_output: 1. Find board. 2. Find 'To Do' list. 3. Create card.
1. Find card. 2. Find 'Done' list. 3. Update card position.

items.input: add checklist to card about deployment
items.expected_output: 1. Find card about deployment. 2. Add checklist to card.
1. Find card. 2. Add label to card.

items.input: create label 'bug' with red color on board
items.expected_output: 1. Find board. 2. Create label with name and color.
1. Find card. 2. Find member john. 3. Add member to card.

items.input: set due date for card to next friday
items.expected_output: 1. Find card. 2. Update card with due date.
1. Find completed card. 2. Archive card.
1. Find old-project board. 2. Request confirmation. 3. Delete board.
items.context: User wants to delete - needs consent

items.input: get cards in In Progress list
items.expected_output: 1. Find In Progress list. 2. Get cards from list.

items.input: add comment to card about fix
items.expected_output: 1. Find card. 2. Add comment to card.
